entry.title: Instant Coffee Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 1190.00

Why try one flavour, when you can try three? This combo pack has three flavours of our 100% Arabica instant coffee- Original, French Vanilla, and Hazelnut. The coffee is made using freeze-dried technology, it easily dissolves in hot or cold water or milk and comes in an airtight container for convenient storage. It’s nothing like you’ve had before.

entry.title: Frothy Instant Combo - French Vanilla
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 1299.00

Delicious coffee, ready in seconds. Shop the ultimate combo of our powerful Frother and French Vanilla Instant Coffee. With a coffee that's 100% Arabica with zero preservatives and a chic Frother that froths like a pro, you can enjoy cafe-like coffee at home. We'd call it a match made in heaven, you can simply call it the best combo ever.

entry.title: French Vanilla Instant Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 569.00

Sweetness of french vanilla blends with chocolate notes of the 100% Arabica soluble crystals and fresh roasted coffee, made using freeze-dried technology. This flavour doesn’t have preservatives, and easily dissolves in hot or cold water or milk to give you delicious coffee in seconds. The airtight container keeps it fresh and makes it easy to store.

entry.title: Instant Coffee Combo Pack
entry.summary:

Why try one flavour, when you can try three? This combo pack has three flavours of our 100% Arabica instant coffee- Original, French Vanilla, and Hazelnut. The coffee is made using freeze-dried technology, it easily dissolves in hot or cold water or milk and comes in an airtight container for convenient storage. It’s nothing like you’ve had before.

entry.title: Travel Mug + Frother + Free Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 2799.00

Here's a deal to steal! We've combined two of our best-selling products to bring you the perfect experience for making and enjoying delicious coffee at home or on the go. So get our Built-For-Life Travel Mug, Powerful Frother, and a bonus Pack of 48 Instant Coffee Sachets for FREE!

entry.title: Instant Coffee Sachets + Travel Mug
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Instant Coffee
Price: 1499.00

Want to have the best quality coffee anywhere you go? We've got you! Get your favourite Instant Coffee in sachets and our Built For Life Travel Mug at Flat 30% Off. All you'll have to do after that is tear the sachet, add it to the Travel Mug and pour cold milk or water. It's that simple!

entry.title: Original Instant Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 569.00

Delicious coffee, ready in seconds. Our Original Instant Coffee has a natural chocolate flavour that comes from the 100% Arabica soluble crystals. It doesn’t have any preservatives and easily dissolves in hot or cold water, and even milk. It comes in an airtight container making it easy to store and keeps the coffee fresh.

entry.title: Hazelnut Instant Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 569.00

Hazelnut is a universally loved flavour of coffee. This chocolatey-nutty flavour is made with our signature 100% Arabica soluble crystals. Hazelnut Instant Coffee is packed in an airtight container which keeps it fresh and doesn’t have any additives. It dissolves in hot or cold water or milk and is unlike any other flavour.

entry.title: Cold Brew Packs / Assorted
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Cold Brew
Price: 600.00 - 1725.00 (3 variants)

Brew Packs

Cold Brew Coffee

Assorted Cold Brew Coffee Pack is filled with the authentic, delicious taste of real good coffee. It includes a collection of our most loved flavours in one box - Original, Hazelnut, French Vanilla, Dark Roast, and Cinnamon, and is the best way to try the variety of Cold Brews we have to offer. Our Cold Brew coffee is made with 100% Arabica beans that have natural chocolatey notes.

entry.title: Cold Brew Packs / Emirates Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Cold Brew
Price: 600.00 - 1500.00 (3 variants)

Brew Packs

Inspired by the Middle East, this exquisite emirates blend is sweet, spicy, and citrusy all at the same time, with an unusual cardamom twist. The chocolatey notes of our 100% Arabica beans enhance these flavours to give you a bold Cold Brew. The blend doesn’t have any preservatives or additives, every flavour you taste is natural, straight from the source.

entry.title: Set of 30 Hot Brew
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Hot Brew
Price: 1200.00

Discover the ultimate coffee experience with our Hot Brew Trio Pack! This exclusive combo includes three delicious blends: Original, French Vanilla and Dark Roast Hot Brew. Crafted from premium 100% Arabica beans, each pack contains 30 servings of exceptional quality coffee. Whether you prefer the classic taste of Original, the sweet touch of French Vanilla, or the intense flavour of Dark Roast, this trio pack is perfect for satisfying your coffee cravings.

entry.summary:

Price: 1299.00

Shop our powerful Frother and enjoy a Bonus Pack of 48 Instant Coffee Sachets for FREE! Whether it's a steaming cup of Cappuccino or a smooth Latte, create barista-worthy thick and creamy froth at home with our chic Frother, while enjoying your coffee in four delicious flavors.

entry.title: Instant Coffee Value pack - Assorted pack of 96
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee

Price: 960.00

A perfect blend of variety and convenience, get your favourite Instant Coffee in sachets in four different flavours and savour a new coffee experience every day. Make the smoothest coffee for yourself anytime, anywhere. All you have to do is tear the sachet, add it to the cup and pour hot milk or water - it's that simple!

entry.title: Instant Coffee Pack of 90
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Instant Coffee
Price: 949.00

Introducing our Coffee Lover's Dream Combo! This incredible value pack features three sets of 30 instant coffee sachets, each offering a delightful trio of flavors: Instant French Vanilla, Instant Hazelnut, and Instant Original. With 90 sachets in total, you can savor a new coffee experience every day. Don't miss out on this perfect blend of convenience and variety. Grab your combo today and elevate your coffee game!

entry.title: Xpresso, Strong Blend Instant Coffee Pack of 2 + Ceramic mug
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Instant Coffee
Price: 999.00

Dark roasted to perfection, Xpresso is the coffee of your darkest and boldest dreams. Packed with flavour that's downright delicious, leave it to Xpresso to satisfy your coffee cravings like never before. It easily dissolves in hot or cold water or milk and the airtight container keeps it fresh and easy to store. But hey, sip at your own risk.

entry.title: French Press & Ground Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 1499.00

A classic barista tool, uplifted by our minimalist design. This brewer makes a mean cup of coffee and looks equally great on a kitchen counter or a desk. This combo contains our French Press and a Free 100% Arabica Course Ground Coffee to go with it. Choose the flavour of your choice from 4 delicious options and enjoy this freshly roasted coffee!

entry.title: Instant Filter Coffee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Instant Coffee
Price: 375.00 - 1125.00 (3 variants)

Authentic South Indian Kaapi, ready in seconds. Enjoy a traditional cup of nutty goodness from the comfort of your home. This filter instant coffee comes in an airtight container to ensure it stays fresh and dissolves in hot or cold water or milk seamlessly. Made with a blend of robusta and chicory, it’s undeniably Kaapi and unbelievably easy.

entry.title: Cold Brew Packs / Caramel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Cold Brew
Price: 600.00 - 1800.00 (3 variants)

Brew Packs

Cold Brew Coffee

Caramel cold brew coffee has a nice ring to it doesn’t it? Well, that’s not the only nice thing about this Cold Brew coffee. It’s a flavour that is rich, bold and very nutty - all things pointing to a cold brew that you have to try. The chocolatey notes of the 100% Arabica beans compliment the sweet and creamy notes of real caramel.

entry.title: Hot Brew Bags / Assorted
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: Hot Brew
Price: 400.00 - 1200.00 (3 variants)

Brew Bags

Hot Coffee

Our Assorted Hot Brew box is for those who cannot pick between our classic bestsellers. Now don't choose and try our Original, Dark Roast, Hazelnut, Cinnamon, and French Vanilla flavours- all in one box! If you're looking for an assortment of all our flavoured bestsellers, then try our Flavour Bomb Hot Brew.

entry.title: Green Ceramic Mug
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sleepy Owl Coffee
Type: merchandise
Price: 599.00

Our Ceramic Mug is specially crafted by hand with ceramic by skilled artisans who use traditional crafting techniques. Each mug brings with it a unique character from the designing process. It is microwave friendly and perfect for your morning coffee. It’s available in two attractive colours for you to choose from.
